description:
Splitwise is the best way to share bills and IOUs and make sure that everyone gets paid back.

- Keep track of apartment bills, random IOUs, and more
- Everyone can log in, see their balances, and add new expenses
- Get push notifications with every update, or just when important bills are due
- (US only) Settle up instantly with PayPal and Venmo

Use Splitwise to split household bills with roommates, to figure out costs for a group vacation, or just to remember when a friend spots you for lunch. On your smartphone or on the Splitwise website, you can view your balances, track spending trends, set up email reminders for bills, and much much more!

"I only wish such a tool had been available when I was a new college graduate..." – Ann Carrns, NYTimes Bucks Blog
"Whoa, @split_wise is what we always wanted livewith.us to be. Totally going to use this in my new apt instead of my own software." – @aroldan
trackCensoredName: Splitwise - Split bills and expenses the easy way
trackName: Splitwise - Split bills and expenses the easy way
releaseNotes:
Just a few small touch-ups in this release: improved support for third-party keyboards, some additional iPhone 6 improvements, and a few other minor bug fixes. Hope you enjoy!

Splitwise is hiring engineers! If you're interested, check out our jobs page at splitwise.com/jobs :)
